5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Abu Zubair reported:I heard Abdullah b. Zubair addressing (people) on the pulpit and saying: When the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) pronounced salutation at the end of the prayer or prayers, and then he made a mention of the hadith as transmitted by Hisham b. 'Urwa

chapter.ara-name: باب اسْتِحْبَابِ الذِّكْرِ بَعْدَ الصَّلاَةِ وَبَيَان صِفَتِهِ
chapter.eng-name: It is recommended to recite statements of remembrance after the prayer, and how that is to be done
